We've all sent an e-mail to the wrong person...
...or maybe you've sent an e-mail to the right person,...
...but you rethought it after you sent it.
You can undo the sendification of an e-mail using Gmail.
Click the little gear icon in the upper right-hand corner to "Settings."
Then under the "Labs" tab, find the "Undo Send" feature and click "Enable."
The next time you send a message, you'll have ten seconds to undo it.
